caption:
In 2010, Schweinsteiger was rumoured to be on the verge of signing for Real Madrid.

After the final game of the season, he was given a microphone. Bayern fans started booing him, expecting a goodbye.

Instead, he announced he was extending his contract—and the whole stadium erupted into applause, celebrating his decision to stay.

Goosebumps. ❤️👏

Schweinsteiger at Bayern.

🏟️ 500 Games
🚀 68 Goals 
🎯 98 Assists 
✅ 13 Seasons
🏆 21 Trophies
